name: Apep
temple_description:
Apep was the god of ancient Egypt, the incarnation of destruction, chaos, and darkness. 
She was the creator of eternal darkness and the most powerful opponent of the Sun god Ra. 
The war between them never ceased, earning her the titles "The Enemy of Ra" and "The King of Chaos."

active_skills.name: Flaming Meteor
active_skills.effect: 80% chance to inflict [Poison], causing enemy to lose 3% current HP for 3 rounds
